Title: The Stormrider's Bond
Description:
This beauty is no ordinary gryphon. It's got the storm within it. I've been trying all day tae calm it down.

It reminds me of an ol' Wildhammer myth. Stormrooks, they were called. Only able to be bonded by gryphon riders of great renown.

If we can show ye got the spirit of the storm, maybe it'll open up tae ye. Try proving yerself in battle.
ObjectivesText: Collect 50 Storm Spirits by slaying powerful creatures of the Dragon Isles.
CompletionText: I've never met such a stubborn gryphon before!
RewardText:
Look at that! I think it likes ye.

Here, I found some gear in the stormrook's saddle. Looks perfect fer ye! And ye certainly deserve to wear something befitting a noble gryphon rider such as yerself.

Objectives.Text: Collect Storm Spirits from creatures of the Dragon Isles
